text: Grzegorz Jan Matuszak (8 January 1941 â€“ 13 September 2022) was a Polish politician. He was in the Democratic Left Alliance. He was in the Senate of Poland 2001 to 2005. Matuszak died on 13 September 2022. He was 81 years old. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Polish politicians
title: Grzegorz Matuszak
